typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DateID as date,
		Date as date,
		Day as string,
		Month as string,
		Year as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Date
source(output(
		CustomerID as long,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		Status as string,
		Hashkey as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Customer
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as short,
		OrderDate as date,
		DueDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		Status as short,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as double,
		TaxAmt as double,
		Freight as double,
		TotalDue as double,
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SOH
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as short,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as double,
		UnitPriceDiscount as double,
		LineTotal as double,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SOD
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ModelName as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		Size as string,
		ListPrice as decimal(8,2),
		StandardCost as decimal(8,2),
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		SellEndDateID as timestamp,
		SellStartDateID as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDateID as timestamp,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		DescriptionCultureAr as string,
		DescriptionCultureEn as string,
		DescriptionCultureFr as string,
		DescriptionCultureHe as string,
		DescriptionCultureTh as string,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Product
SOH, Date join(OrderDate == DateID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrderDate
JoinOrderDate, Customer join(SOH@CustomerID == Customer@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomer
JoinCustomer select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID = DateID,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status = SOH@Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID = Customer@CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = SOH@ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH
SelectSOH, Date join(DueDate == DateID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDueDate
JoinDueDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDateID = DateID,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH1
SelectSOH1, Date join(ShipDate == DateID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinShipDate
JoinShipDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDateID,
		ShipDateID = DateID,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH2
SelectSOH2, Date join(ModifiedDate == DateID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinModifiedDate
JoinModifiedDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDateID,
		ShipDateID,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDateID = DateID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH3
SOD, Product join(SOD@ProductID == Product@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct, Date join(ModifiedDate == DateID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDate
JoinDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID = Product@ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDateID = DateID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOD
SelectSOD derive(ModifiedDateID = iif(isNull(ModifiedDateID), 
currentDate(), ModifiedDateID)) ~> SetDatesSOD
SelectSOH3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		OrderDateID as date,
		DueDateID as date,
		ShipDateID as date,
		ModifiedDateID as date,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDateID,
		ShipDateID,
		ModifiedDateID,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue
	)) ~> sinkSOH
SetDatesSOD sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal,
		ModifiedDateID
	)) ~> sinkSOD
